page.title: 06LOCHGOILHEAD-LAW & ORDER(1)
page.content: Our village is looked after by P.C. Templeton who has been a policeman for six years. He is a member of the{ {Strathclyde Police Force,}which is divided into 15 Divisions.He is in{L {Division,}which is sub-divided into beats and he patrols{Beat 51.} His immediate superior is Sergeant MacColl,who is based at Inveraray,and who has three constables under his command. When Constable Templeton is off duty his beat is covered by the Inveraray Police. P.C.Templeton is kept quite busy all year,but especially so in summer when most crimes occur and in winter when he regularly patrols the A83 at the Rest and Be Thankful in bad weather.
